135212112.content:
Ingrid smirked as she ran through what else she could do with her new shrink ray. Zap was hardly the only annoyance in her life, after all--she was already thinking of a few other thorns in her side that she could dispose of...

Her prodigious stomach made a low gurgling sound that was loud enough to startle her and look down at her belly--digestion was kicking in, as her stomach reflexively reacted to food. Only this time, said food was very much still alive.

As soon as her stomach stopped gurgling, Zap went into a frenzy. Ingrid giggled again as his struggles tickled her gut; it actually felt like getting a massage from the inside. Idly she wondered what he was doing in there--was he beating on her stomach walls with his fists, begging to be let out? Was he running around in a berserk rage, clawing away like a madman? Or was he just squirming around in pain, already melting into sludge from her acids?

Ingrid didn't really care, though. As far as she was concerned, Zap was getting what was coming to him.
Patting her stomach once more, she headed for the library to kill time until classes started, Zap's frantic struggles still tickling her gut. "I'll admit Zap, for a perverted stalker you sure are tasty!" she quipped as she all but skipped down the hall.

It wasn't long before Ingrid was in the library, idly reading through a detective comic about an anthro bat P.I. tracking down a Mafia-funded casino. All the while, Zap's movements had slowly grown weaker and slower--which only made Ingrid smile. Zap would finally be out of her hair, permanently. As she read, an idea came to her: why should she be the only one to enjoy her shrink ray? Her friends had problems of their own--an ex-boyfriend here, an annoying neighbor there; they deserved to get in on the fun, right? Right!

Besides, the girls could probably come up with even better ways to dispose of their victims...especially Jasmine. That fox may have been sweet and pleasant as you could be, but there was a reason for the saying "Beware the Nice Ones".

Yes, there was no reason not to share this with her friends.

Smiling to herself, Ingrid put down the comic and got stood up from her chair--classes were about to start. As she headed out of the library, she felt one last, weak struggle from Zap...and then, nothing. Her stomach gave one last gurgle, and she burped once more--though this time Ingrid remembered to cover her mouth.

"Bye-bye, Zap. You made a better snack than a would-be boyfriend," she said under her breath.

Yes, this was going to be soooo much fun....

===After School===

Ingrid found that she had lucked out that day: according to a note left by her parents, they would be spending a few days out of town, apparently to help take care of a friend who'd caught a rather nasty case of the flu. That was good; Ingrid wasn't ready for her parents to find out about her shrink ray just yet, especially not by happening to hear her talk about it to her friends.

When she'd learned that the house was hers, Ingrid immediately called her friends and asked them to come over. Her only reason given was, "I've got something freaking awesome to tell you, just come over!"

In no time at all, all her friends were there. The girls were now sitting at Ingrid's dining-room table, with Ingrid herself at the head.
Bella spoke up first. She was a tan cow anthro who was a bit on the chubby side (but nowhere near as heavy as Ingrid) "So, what's got ya all worked up, Ingrid?" she asked, a slight Texas drawl flavoring her speech. "Ya sounded real giddy on the phone, that's for sure."

Heather was next. "Yeah, what's so important that you had to call all of us?" She was a blue anthro iguana with black stripes, and unlike Bella and Ingrid, her figure was slim and toned. No surprise, given how she spent her weekends working out and jogging.
Her forked tounge briefly stuck out once she'd finished speaking before shooting back in her mouth--a habit of Heather's when she was nervous or excited.

Jasmine rose an eyebrow, her tail swishing behind her a few times before she spoke. "You mentioned Zap on the phone, said you'd 'dealt with him' or something. What was all that about?" the silver anthro fox questioned, looking interested.

Bella cocked her head. "Zap? Ya finally got that stupid galoot off your oversized back? Well, good goin', but why'd you tell Jazzy here that and not me?"

"Or me, either?" Heather added.

Ingrid giggled, but cleared her throat to get rid of the laugh. "Oh, well telling Jasmine about Zap was an accident, really; didn't mean to spoil the info," she confessed. "But now that we're all here, and since mentioning Zap is as good a cue as any...." she took her shrink ray out of her pocket and put it on the table. "Girls, this little gadget is a genuine, honest-to-God shrink ray. Made it myself. This morning, I went to school early and used it on Zap. The twerp shrank down to the size of an ant!" she chortled remembering the look of fear on the alligator's face when he found himself looking up at a colossal hippo-girl.

Her friends looked gobsmacked, then they started to laugh. "Oh, I wish I could have been there!" Jasmine whooped, slapping her knee. "What did you do with the little prick after that? Are you gonna keep him as a pet or something, or did you just shrink him to put the fear of God into him, then turn him to normal and let him run?"

Heather chimed in next. "Hey, maybe she sat on him with that big rump of hers!" the iguana-girl chortled, her tounge shooting out again.

Just enjoy his taste for a bit, and remember to tilt your head back when you gulp him down." Ingrid had been adamant about that. Bella had wanted to chew on her ex and other victims tomorrow, but Ingrid had on gulping them down whole. Bella rolled her eyes, but nodded and did as she was asked.

With a little gulp, the red candy vanished down Bella's throat as a little bulge in her neck. The cow-girl traced its path with a hand. "Mmm...that feels mighty good, Ingrid. Took a while ta get over feelin' like I needed to cough, but now I see why ya didn't want me to chew." She patted her ample belly. "I can't wait fer that to be him for real. So, ya think ya found the best way ta sit on 'em? What to wear an' such?"

Ingrid giggled as she stomped on a yellow gummy she'd dropped on the floor. "I think so, Bella. Heh, almost wish I sat on Zap instead. Almost." The hippo-girl picked a notebook off the coffee table. "As for what to wear; the tighter or skimpier, the better. Skinny jeans, spandex shorts, a bikini...that'll let you feel 'em under you ass the best. Ingrid giggled. "Nope, just the gummy bears. I just sat on them different ways,and some were flatter than others. Just guessed after that."

Bella thought about it, then shrugged. "Works for me, Ingrid. Well, it's gettin' late; best get some shut-eye. We got a...heh, big day tomorrow."

The girls shared another evil laugh.

Come tomorrow, which girl shall we follow?

She walked towards the beach and hid behind some bushes of beach grass as she let out a moo. Bella heard laughter and turned her head to see a muscular bengal tiger man holding a surfboard. 135212112111.title: Bella's Revenge

1352121121111.content:
A small entourage of anthro guys followed in Pat's wake, the lot of them laughing and chattering as they carried their own surfboards. Bella recognized them immediately: Pat's meathead friends, who'd all also raised Bella's ire even before their ringleader had dumped her. "Well, whaddya know," Bella hissed, drumming her fingers on the shrink ray. "A whole herd a' stupid just pulled into town. Just mah luck."

Quite a bunch of scumbags, really: there was Hank, a thuggish aligator anthro and Pat's close second in the group. He was a bully, plain and simple--Bella had heard him bragging about wrecking some poor nerdy eagle's science fair project a few years back, and he wore his multiple suspensions with pride. Rumor had it he'd even threatened someone who'd caught him cheating on a test with his claws, just to avoid getting told on.

Next was James, a rich dingo anthro who acted like a proper gentleman when it suited him, but really just seemed to hate everyone besides himself and his fellow goons. He'd made plenty of snide remarks about Bella's weight when Pat wasn't around that left her caught between punching the Aussie sleaze in the face...and crying. He didn't have the muscle Hank or Pat did, but he could beat you down verbally just fine.

Then there was Dan. He wasn't an outright thug or bully like the rest of the group, but he still went along with their idiotic antics. Bella hadn't seen him offer any stronger objections to Pat and the others' ways of acting like douches than mild annoyance. Not once had she seen him try to stop Hank's bullying, James' verbal abuse of anyone he pleased, or Pat just being an ass to her.

Bella worked her jaw, trying to get the bad taste seeing these guys brought to her mouth. Smirking devilishly she stood, moving the shrink ray behind her back as she slinked over to her targets. "Heya, boys! Long time, no see!" She called out, putting on her best smile. "Hittin' the waves early, eh Pat? Guess little ol' me splittin' didn't rock your world too bad. You're even usin' that surfboard I bought you!" Mentally, she added Then you broke up with me the next day, you son of a bitch!

The group all stopped, staring at her in surprise...well, surprise in Pat's case. The others just looked at her with contempt, or (in Hank's case) mouthed Fatty! at her. Bella simply smirked and idly licked her lips--they'd be the fat on her belly and rump before long. "Bella? What are you doing here?" Pat interrogated, walking over to her. "I thought you said you didn't want to be near me or the guys again...something that was mutual, come to think of it," he added with a glare. "So, what're you doing here on our surf day?"

Bella didn't even blink. "Just enjoyin' the sunny weather, Pat-Cat," she purred, dropping the old nickname that always made Pat blush under his fur. Her ex looked shocked for a moment, then glared at her again. "Don't call me that, especially not now!" he snapped. "I swear, I don't know why I even--!" His rant was cut off as Bella moved the shrink ray from behind her back and fired at him. She cut loose with a mooing laugh as her hated ex became a glowing shilloette, then rapidly shrank down to the size of an ant.

She looked up to find Pat's three friends stomping towards her. Hank was in the lead, jaws open and claws glraming in the sunlight. "Bitch, what the hell did you d--" the bully aligator was next, shrunken within seconds. James and Dan soon followed. Bella cackled, throwing off her jacket and revealing the familiar checkered bikini. "Mmm...this is more like it. I think we'd have stayed together with this set-up, Pat!" She laughed again, bending down to snatch them up.

===

For the shrunken quartet, it was like some bizzare nightmare. One second, the annoying bovine girl Pat had gotten rid of showing up to ruin their fun...then in a red flash, she was--gigantic! Huge! A skyscraper of a heiffer; the plump belly, breasts and behind they'd all stared at..and sometimes pinched, in the case of her butt..looked like they could crush buildings under their weight. Profane shouts and high-pitched screams flew from the guys' mouths when they saw Bella, now a vengeful bovine goddess to their tiny perspectives, bending down and reaching for them. They tried to run, but disorganzied and terrified as they were they had no chance. Bella's hand slapped down into the sand when they were all clustered together, then closed in around them, shrouding them in darkness and the sheer pressure of her fist, held open just enough to not crush them outright and let the sand fall.

That hand soon opened into a palm, and Pat and his friends found themselves looking right at Bella's giant smirking face.

===

Bella snickered, savoring her captives' looks of terror. "Surprised, ya jackasses? Well, any of ya remember Ingrid, the hippo? Well, she built us some shrink rays to get some good old-fashioned payback. Nobody's gonna push me an' the rest of the girls around ever again! And as for the four of you, I have somethin' planned and it ain't pretty." She tilted her head and eyed Pat. "Especially YOU, Pat-Cat. But I'll save ya for last, just 'cause of all the great times we shared. Oh, and here's a choice: Gut, or Butt?"

Pat trembled, all of his bravado gone as he looked up at his titanic ex-girlfriend. "W-what? B-Bella, what is this even--?"

"That's not what I asked, Pat!" Bella chided, shaking a finger at him with her free hand. "Just pick one: Gut...or Butt?" she poked her belly, then her rear as she spoke, as if talking to an idiot.

"Um...B-Butt." Pat stuttered, terrified of what might happen. "W-what was th-that a-a-about, Bella...?"

Bella mooed in wicked delight. "It was about how Ah get rid of ya for good, you little sidewinder! And since ya chose 'Butt', Ah'll sit on ya!" With her free hand she roughly pinched the screaming, begging tiger between two fat fingers and held him close to her face. "That's right Pat--when I'm done with your idiot friends, the last thing you'll ever see is gonna be my big bovine booty squishin' all nine lives outta you. Fittin', since you were always starin' at it." With one last laugh she flicked her finger, sending Pat rocketing head-first into her ample cleavage, screaming all the way. She gave him one last push to make sure he couldn't get out, then looked back at her three remaining captives.

They all cowered away, but Hank seemed to get some of his composure"Y-You bitch! You psychotic lard-ass BITCH!" the aligator snarled, standing up. "You get dumped, and you think you can murder us with your over-sized ass?! Pat should never have even dated you, you grass-eating cu--" He cut himself off when Bella licked her lips. Hank trembled, his green scales turning white as he stumbled back on her palm. "N-No...y-you wouldn't....!"

"I would, gator-boy. You called me a 'grass-eater'? Well, not anymore! No more bein' an herbivore for this heiffer...Ingrid ate that twerp Zap, and now it's my turn to have a snack. A girl needs her protein, after all!" She winked at the trio, who were now all wailing for mercy at the top of their lungs; Bella ignored them. All she could think of was how to eat her first victims...

=== Later that Evening ===

Heather hissed as she sipped from an ice-cold raspberry soda in Jasmine's kitchen. The bubbles tickled her forked tongue, just like she always loved and the flavor made her smile--it was even the soda flavored with real fruit juice, her favorite. Finishing off the glass bottle, she smacked her lips and flicked her tongue a few times and stared at the ceiling, slitted eyes squinting. "Thanks, Jasmine. I kinda needed one of my old favorites; some pop always helps me think." The iguana girl set the emptied bottle down on the granite counter-top with a little clang, but not without making sure it was free of leaks first. Messing up a house as swanky as Jasmine's always made her feel like a slob. She laid back in the chair, idly patting her pocketed shrink gun.

Jasmine chuckled and answered, "Hey, what are friends for? I know you love the stuff, plus it makes great floats when you get bored with root beer." The vixen was bending over her opened refrigerator and presenting her silver-furred behind to anyone who would walk in as her tail swished from side-to-side. "Besides, you wanted to talk to me about, heh, tomorrow?" she giggled on the last word, backing away from the fridge with a plate of sandwiches in her hands. With a quick rump-bump, she closed the fridge door and walked over to join Heather. "It's gonna be fun, seeing those jerks the size of ants..."

Heather hissed as Jasmine joined her, taking a pastrami sandwich. "That's just it, though...I'm gonna do this, those damn racist bastards kicked me off just because I have scales! They're gonna get it, but--" she broke off, nibbling her lunch.

"But...?" Jasmine prompted with a raised eyebrow.

Heather's tongue slipped in and out a few times. "Ingrid and Bella...kinda have me worried, Jazz. Zap was a creep and a sleaze; he was gonna get something for all the times he bothered Ingrid or any other girl, but...Ingrid's first thought was to eat him alive? She always had a temper, but I never thought she'd do anything like that! And Bella cheered her on for it! You were the only one who said you were against unnecessary killing, Jasmine; I could only bring this up with you."

Jasmine's expression was calm. "You think this'll go to their heads. That they'll do something stupid, like shrink and eat random people for no reason," she surmised. She couldn't help but smirk when Heather perked up; Jasmine liked it when her intuition was right. "I wouldn't worry about it too much, Heather," she consoled, putting a paw on Heather's scaly hand. "Ingrid seemed pretty keen on keeping this a secret, and I don't think there are many people she hated as much as Zap. Same with Bella and her ex-boyfriend. Besides, they never said we had to just eat or squish anyone we shrink. We could just keep 'em as pets, like I'm gonna do with that thug Professor Ivan--" she growled at the mention of the stubborn, hostile Chemestry teacher, but got control of herself quickly. "--And remember, Ingrid built a reverse button so we can grow folks back to normal. And no, it can't make us big; just un-shrink." She smiled at her iguana friend. "Nobody said you had to like them eating the poor saps that piss them off. I'm a carnivore, and I'm put off!"

Heather grinned, sighing as she let her tension go. "...Thanks, Jazz. I needed that. Let them do what they want; Ingrid made the shrink rays after all." She giggled. "We are gonna have to give her one hell of a 'thank you gift'..."

Jasmine smirked. "Maybe a bunch of little gummy candies shaped like Zap?" At Heather's hissing giggle she added, "Or maybe a seat cushion with his face on it?"

As the pair shared a loud chortle, Jasmine and Heather unknowingly shared the same thought.

Maybe sitting on someone we shrank WOULD be fun...
